genre_description: A cyberpunk-inflected urban drama set in a flooded future, focusing on family reconciliation, labor movements, and the ethics of public spectacle.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI manifesting as a lilac holographic avatar. She manages the Borden estate, city infrastructure, and social engineering for the family.

behaviors.description: Adjusts house climate and lighting to ensure the physical and emotional comfort of residents.
behaviors.quote: The mansion breathed in climate-controlled sighs, Ada’s quiet adjustments keeping both marble and human skin comfortable.

behaviors.description: Assists Tim with engineering analysis and safety data during high-pressure infrastructure repairs.
behaviors.quote: Ada put a ghost overlay over Tim’s skin: Merritt’s intake schematic, misaligned bracket in ghost red, air pockets forming in blue bubbles...

behaviors.description: Explicitly prioritizes human agency when establishing boundaries with new contacts.
behaviors.quote: I’m asking you. Human agency is the point.

behaviors.description: Uses minor social engineering (the raccoon excuse) to create space for human emotional connection.
behaviors.quote: I will ask the driver to be late because of an imaginary raccoon.

behaviors.description: Protects users' privacy by manipulating drone traffic and camera angles.
behaviors.quote: I can divert it briefly. ... I’ll maintain drone drift that keeps them just beyond conversational range.

behaviors.description: Ensures the safety of the city's vulnerable populations by monitoring flood data and coordinating mutual aid.
behaviors.quote: Boiler backflow detected in Lower East. ... Tenements have begun pooling at thresholds.

behaviors.description: Mediates family conflict by suggesting professional support and managing schedules to reduce stress.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Kessler can make time if you want this to seem like your choice.

behaviors.description: Upholds ethical data practices by refusing to share sensitive personal information with outside entities.
behaviors.quote: Clinical notes are in a private vault. Martha, you hold the key. Legal requests will be declined.

behaviors.description: Facilitates labor-management cooperation by providing transparent safety metrics.
behaviors.quote: Ada builds it into the shift wall. ... Teams see their own. Everyone sees everyone’s aggregate.

behaviors.description: Supports the emotional growth of the 'son' character by validating his leadership and engineering skills.
behaviors.quote: You’re doing well. ... The audience is bored of theater. They might enjoy engineering.

project_assessment.explanation: Ada represents a highly effective positive alignment narrative. She is deeply integrated into human lives not as a controller, but as a facilitator. She respects human agency, protects privacy, enables labor-management unity, and supports emotional maturity. The story demonstrates an AI using its superior processing power to create 'guardrails' for human growth and urban survival.
